Summary: there were three orbs of light moving to the east ,once they went past us within 15 mins they were coming from the east again
divs: Sighting DetailsI WAS DRIVING DOWN THE STREET TO TAKE MY DAUGHTER TO THE STORE ,I OBSERVED SOME RED LIGHTS ,I THOUGHT THEY WERE LIGHTS FROM A TOWER ,BUT THEY WERE MOVING TOWARD US ,I WAS JUST WONDERING WHAT IT WAS ,I PULLED UP TO MY HOUSE AND PICKED UP MY OTHER DAUGHTER ,WE RODE BACK DOWN THE STREET TO SEE IF WE COULD STILL SEE THE LIGHTS ,WE DIDNT SEE THEM RIGHT OFF,THEN WE SAW THEM THEY WERE LIKE STACKED ON TOP OF EACH OTHER BUT NOT TOUCHING ,THEN THEY FORMED A TRIANGLE I WAS TRYING TO GET MY DAUGHTER TO GET IT ON VIDEO BUT SHE COULDNT GET THEM BECAUSE THEY MAY HAVE BEEN TO FAR AWAY FOR THE CAMERA,SHE WAS SCREAMING GET IN THE CAR THEY GONE GET US ,SHE WAS PANICKING SO WE GOT IN THE CAR AND WENT TO QUICK TRIP,WE COULDNT SEE THEM PAST THE TREES SO WE DROVE BACK UP THE STREET ,I SAW A POLICE CAR AND WENT TO ASK HIM IF HE HAD SAW THE LIGHTS HE SAID NO,I TOLD HIM TO BE ON THE LOOK OUT ,I CALLED 911 WHEN I FIRST SAW THE LIGHTS AND THE OPERATOR WAS LIKE WHTA DO YOU WANT US TO DO ,I TOLD HER I DONT KNOW I WAS JUST TELLING THEM WHAT I SAW I HEADED BACK TOWARD MY HOUSE DIDNT SEE THEM ANYMORE PULLED UP IN MY DRIVEWAY AND DECIDED TO SIT OUTSIDE TO SEE IF WE WOULD SEE THEM AGAIN ,AND WITHIN TWO MINS OF PULLING UP THEY WERE BACK ,THIS TIME THE WERE LIKE IN A LINE ,AS THE ALMOST GOT OUT OF VIEW THE ONE INTHE BACK CLOSEST TO US DISSAPPEARED THEN THE MIDDLEONE THEN THE FIRST ONE ,WITHIN ANOTHER FIFTEEN MINS THEY WERE BACK AGAIN ,COMING FROM THE EAST HEADING NORTHWEST ,THIS WENT ON FROM ABOUT 10:00 PM TO 12:30AM WE SAW THEM A TOTAL OF SIX TIMES I DECIDED TO COME IN THE HOUSE AROUND 12:30 IT HAD BEENA LITTLE WHILE SINCE OUR LAST SIGHTING IT WASNT A HELICOPTER OR A PLANE THERE WAS NO SOUND I DONT KNOW WHAT THEY WERE BUT I KNOW WHAT THEY WERENT.
trends: There have been 28 other sightings in Blue Springs
There were 3 other sightings in Blue Springs on or around July 15th 2012
